---

**Context**
The `contracts/liquidity_pool/src/lib.rs` file contains the core logic for our AMM but lacks documentation.

**Task**
Add `///` comments to public functions (`initialize`, `deposit`, `swap`, `withdraw`) explaining parameters and return values.

**Resources**
- [Rustdoc Guide](https://doc.rust-lang.org/rustdoc/what-is-rustdoc.html)
